article_title: Sometimes, it's good to be Blue (Cross Blue Shield) - Modern Healthcare Vital Signs

article_metadata.description: One of the last pages of the massive spending bill Congress passed this month also included a line about the “modification of treatment of certain health organizations.” The wonky text essentially provided a break for Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans, although they are not mentioned by name.
article_metadata.title: Sometimes, it's good to be Blue (Cross Blue Shield)
